TopicTitle: Tanks: multiple fuel options in VAB

Articles.Content:
Could someone write a plug in or ModuleManager file(?) to set the type of fuel and or the amount when in VAB?

What I mean is when you have a tank that normally holds 110 fuel and 90 oxidiser (or was it the other way around?), that you could change that in the VAB to 200 fuel. Or 200 Monopropellant or 200 Karbonite or whatever. Can this be done?
I believe Modular Fuel Tanks does what you're looking for, at least for stock resources. Not sure about karbonite or other resources added by mods.

Could someone write a plug in or ModuleManager file(?) to set the type of fuel and or the amount when in VAB?

What I mean is when you have a tank that normally holds 110 fuel and 90 oxidiser (or was it the other way around?), that you could change that in the VAB to 200 fuel. Or 200 Monopropellant or 200 Karbonite or whatever. Can this be done?

FireSpitter does this (I use it on a lot of the USI mods).
